product_name: Pearl Izumi SELECT LTD Bike Jersey - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Stay comfortable in warm, sunny weather with the Pearl Izumi SELECT LTD bike jersey, which helps keep you cool and dry as you ride. Soft fabric wicks moisture away from your body and dries quickly to maximize comfort. Fabric provides UPF 40 sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. 12 in. zipper provides quick ventilation control. Three back pockets stash food and other essentials. The Pearl Izumi SELECT LTD bike jersey has a semi-formfitting cut that's not too tight and not too loose. Closeout.
short_description: Stay comfortable in warm, sunny weather with the Pearl Izumi SELECT LTD bike jersey, which helps keep you cool and dry as you ride.
